title: Spike Feresten
description: This week we're joined in studio by Spike Feresten (@SpikeFeresten) host of Car Matchmaker on Esquire.  We cover Spike's deep love of Porsches, his time working with Jerry Seinfeld and cheating at gokart racing with David Letterman for the Late Show Team.  In addition we talk Pebble Beach, the spite of Ferrari, Barn Finds and Matt cracks the wheels on his Corvette for a 3rd time.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
